$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror/mode/ht.title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror/mode/htmlmixed/htmlmixed.js

$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-ht.title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-htmlmixed/readme
$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-ht.text: This plugin adds Syntax Highlighting for HTML tiddlers (text/html) to the [[CodeMirror|http://codemirror.net]] text editor. It needs the latest [[CodeMirror plugin|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror]] to be installed
